mapper.select: SELECT b.*, t.id PutQuestionsToId, t.object_user_id, t.start_user_id, t.question_back_id, t.description FROM ybd_question_back b, ybd_put_questions_to t WHERE b.id = t.question_back_id
SELECT u.user_name userName, p.*, q.* FROM ybd_user u, ybd_put_questions_to p, ybd_question_back q WHERE u.id = q.create_user AND p.question_back_id = q.id and q.id=#{id}
